excerpt.rendered:
Give the gift of stickers! Do you have any artist in your life? Then this is a perfect present for them ♡

Send them a sweet little note and enter in whatever dollar amount feels right! Either choose from sending the digital card instantly, or select a later date.
The gift card will arrive at noon on the day you selected.
